dct_title_s: Carte reduite des costes occidentales d'Afrique : seconde feuille depuis le Cap Bojador jusqu'a la Rivière de Sierra Léona
dct_description_sm: dressée au Dépost des cartes, plans, et journaux de la marine par le Sr. Bellin ; Scale approximately 1:2,700,000 ; Relief shown pictorially ; Prime meridians: Ferro and Teneriffe ; Originally published in 1753 and corrected in 1765 ; Includes a decorative title cartouche, one compass rose, nautical soundings, and a publisher's stamp ; Companion map to Carte reduite des costes occidentales d'Afrique : Première feuille contenant les costes de Barbarie depuis le Detroit de Gibraltar et les Isles Canaries ; Detached from an edition of J.N. Bellin : Hydrographie française ; Paris : Département de la marine; Source: Bellin, Jacques Nicolas, 1703-1772. Hydrographie française. Paris : Département de la marine, 1765.
dct_creator_sm: France. Dépôt des cartes, plans, et journaux de la marine
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
